pullrequest.title: Added concave mesh support to bullet

content.raw:
Yeah, I was thinking about that. I'd have to create a special mesh with two submeshes, such as two different sized boxes). Then load the mesh, and only specify one submesh, say the small box. Then I could project a ray, or use a laser sensor, to check for correct collisions.

I'll see if I can get it done today.
content.html:
Yeah, I was thinking about that. I'd have to create a special mesh with two submeshes, such as two different sized boxes). Then load the mesh, and only specify one submesh, say the small box. Then I could project a ray, or use a laser sensor, to check for correct collisions.

I'll see if I can get it done today.
